startingEquipment: Greataxe or any martial melee weapon
Two handaxes or any simple weapon

classFeatures.name: Rage
classFeatures.description: Enter a rage as a bonus action. Gain advantage on STR checks and saves, bonus melee damage, and resistance to physical damage.

classFeatures.name: Unarmored Defense
classFeatures.description: While not wearing armor, AC = 10 + DEX modifier + CON modifier.

barbarian.description: A fierce warrior of primitive background who can enter a battle rage.

availableSubclasses.name: Path of the Berserker
availableSubclasses.description: Channel rage into unmatched ferocity, becoming a relentless force of destruction.

availableSubclasses.name: Path of the Totem Warrior
availableSubclasses.description: Draw spiritual power from animal totems, gaining primal abilities in combat.

startingEquipment: Rapier or longsword or any simple weapon

classFeatures.name: Spellcasting
classFeatures.description: Cast bard spells using Charisma as your spellcasting ability.

classFeatures.name: Bardic Inspiration
classFeatures.description: Grant an ally a d6 bonus die they can add to ability checks, attack rolls, or saving throws.

bard.description: An inspiring magician whose power echoes the music of creation.

availableSubclasses.name: College of Lore
availableSubclasses.description: Master knowledge and secrets, using cutting words and additional magical secrets.

availableSubclasses.name: College of Valor
availableSubclasses.description: Inspire greatness in battle, combining magic with martial prowess.

startingEquipment: Scale mail, leather armor, or chain mail
Light crossbow and 20 bolts or any simple weapon

classFeatures.name: Spellcasting
classFeatures.description: Cast cleric spells using Wisdom as your spellcasting ability.

classFeatures.name: Divine Domain
classFeatures.description: Choose a divine domain that grants you domain spells and other features.

cleric.description: A priestly champion who wields divine magic in service of a higher power.

availableSubclasses.name: Knowledge Domain
availableSubclasses.description: Seek and preserve knowledge, gaining expertise and divine insight.

availableSubclasses.name: Life Domain
availableSubclasses.description: Focus on healing and vitality, becoming the ultimate healer.

availableSubclasses.name: Light Domain
availableSubclasses.description: Wield the power of light and fire against darkness.

availableSubclasses.name: Nature Domain
availableSubclasses.description: Channel the primal forces of nature and protect the wild.

availableSubclasses.name: Tempest Domain
availableSubclasses.description: Command storms and lightning, becoming a force of nature.

availableSubclasses.name: Trickery Domain
availableSubclasses.description: Master deception and illusion through divine trickery.

availableSubclasses.name: War Domain
availableSubclasses.description: Become a divine warrior, blessed with martial prowess.

startingEquipment: Wooden shield or any simple weapon
Scimitar or any simple melee weapon
Leather armor, explorer's pack, and druidic focus

classFeatures.name: Spellcasting
classFeatures.description: Cast druid spells using Wisdom as your spellcasting ability.

classFeatures.name: Druidic
classFeatures.description: You know Druidic, the secret language of druids.

druid.description: A priest of the Old Faith, wielding the powers of nature and adopting animal forms.

availableSubclasses.name: Circle of the Land
availableSubclasses.description: Draw power from the land itself, gaining spells based on your chosen terrain.

availableSubclasses.name: Circle of the Moon
availableSubclasses.description: Master wild shape, transforming into powerful beasts.

startingEquipment: Chain mail or leather armor, longbow, and 20 arrows
Martial weapon and shield or two martial weapons
Light crossbow and 20 bolts or two handaxes

classFeatures.name: Fighting Style
classFeatures.description: Choose a fighting style specialty such as Archery, Defense, Dueling, or Great Weapon Fighting.

classFeatures.name: Second Wind
classFeatures.description: Regain hit points equal to 1d10 + fighter level as a bonus action.

fighter.description: A master of martial combat, skilled with a variety of weapons and armor.

availableSubclasses.name: Champion
availableSubclasses.description: Focus on physical excellence and devastating critical hits.

availableSubclasses.name: Battle Master
availableSubclasses.description: Use superiority dice and combat maneuvers to control the battlefield.

availableSubclasses.name: Eldritch Knight
availableSubclasses.description: Combine martial prowess with wizardry and arcane magic.

classFeatures.name: Unarmored Defense
classFeatures.description: While not wearing armor, AC = 10 + DEX modifier + WIS modifier.

classFeatures.name: Martial Arts
classFeatures.description: Use DEX instead of STR for unarmed strikes and monk weapons. Deal 1d4 damage with unarmed strikes.

monk.description: A master of martial arts, harnessing the power of the body in pursuit of physical and spiritual perfection.

availableSubclasses.name: Way of the Open Hand
availableSubclasses.description: Master unarmed combat techniques to manipulate and harm foes.

availableSubclasses.name: Way of Shadow
availableSubclasses.description: Use stealth and shadow magic to become a ninja-like warrior.

availableSubclasses.name: Way of the Four Elements
availableSubclasses.description: Harness elemental power through ki, bending the elements to your will.

startingEquipment: Martial weapon and shield or two martial weapons
Five javelins or any simple melee weapon

classFeatures.name: Divine Sense
classFeatures.description: Detect the presence of celestials, fiends, and undead within 60 feet.

classFeatures.name: Lay on Hands
classFeatures.description: Heal wounds or cure diseases by touch. Pool of healing = paladin level Ã— 5.

paladin.description: A holy warrior bound to a sacred oath, wielding divine magic and martial prowess.

availableSubclasses.name: Oath of Devotion
availableSubclasses.description: Uphold the ideals of justice, virtue, and order as a knight in shining armor.

availableSubclasses.name: Oath of the Ancients
availableSubclasses.description: Preserve light and life, drawing power from nature and ancient fey magic.

availableSubclasses.name: Oath of Vengeance
availableSubclasses.description: Punish wrongdoers and hunt down evil with relentless determination.

startingEquipment: Two shortswords or two simple melee weapons

classFeatures.name: Favored Enemy
classFeatures.description: Choose a type of favored enemy. Gain advantages when tracking and recalling information about them.

classFeatures.name: Natural Explorer
classFeatures.description: Choose a favored terrain. Gain benefits when traveling in that terrain.

ranger.description: A warrior who uses martial prowess and nature magic to combat threats on the edges of civilization.

availableSubclasses.name: Hunter
availableSubclasses.description: Master techniques for fighting hordes or individual powerful foes.

availableSubclasses.name: Beast Master
availableSubclasses.description: Forge a bond with an animal companion that fights alongside you.

startingEquipment: Shortbow and quiver of 20 arrows or shortsword
Burglar's pack, dungeoneer's pack, or explorer's pack
Leather armor, two daggers, and thieves' tools

classFeatures.name: Expertise
classFeatures.description: Double your proficiency bonus for two skills or tools you're proficient with.

classFeatures.name: Sneak Attack
classFeatures.description: Deal extra 1d6 damage when you have advantage or an ally is within 5 feet of target.

rogue.description: A scoundrel who uses stealth and trickery to overcome obstacles and enemies.

availableSubclasses.name: Thief
availableSubclasses.description: Master of burglary, with quick hands and a knack for finding traps.

availableSubclasses.name: Assassin
availableSubclasses.description: Master of dealing death from the shadows with deadly precision.

availableSubclasses.name: Arcane Trickster
availableSubclasses.description: Combine stealth with enchantment and illusion magic.

startingEquipment: Light crossbow and 20 bolts or any simple weapon

classFeatures.name: Spellcasting
classFeatures.description: Cast sorcerer spells using Charisma as your spellcasting ability.

classFeatures.name: Sorcerous Origin
classFeatures.description: Choose the source of your innate magical power, such as Draconic Bloodline or Wild Magic.

sorcerer.description: A spellcaster who draws on inherent magic from a gift or bloodline.

availableSubclasses.name: Draconic Bloodline
availableSubclasses.description: Draw power from a draconic ancestor, gaining draconic resilience and elemental affinity.

availableSubclasses.name: Wild Magic
availableSubclasses.description: Channel unpredictable chaos magic that can surge with random effects.

startingEquipment: Light crossbow and 20 bolts or any simple weapon
Leather armor, any simple weapon, and two daggers

classFeatures.name: Otherworldly Patron
classFeatures.description: Choose a patron such as The Fiend, The Archfey, or The Great Old One.

classFeatures.name: Pact Magic
classFeatures.description: Cast warlock spells using Charisma. Regain all spell slots on a short rest.

warlock.description: A wielder of magic derived from a bargain with an extraplanar entity.

availableSubclasses.name: The Fiend
availableSubclasses.description: Make a pact with a demon or devil, gaining dark powers and resistance to fire.

availableSubclasses.name: The Archfey
availableSubclasses.description: Forge a bargain with a fey lord or lady, gaining enchantment and trickery powers.

availableSubclasses.name: The Great Old One
availableSubclasses.description: Serve an incomprehensible cosmic entity, gaining telepathy and mind-bending magic.

classFeatures.name: Spellcasting
classFeatures.description: Cast wizard spells using Intelligence as your spellcasting ability.

classFeatures.name: Arcane Recovery
classFeatures.description: Recover some expended spell slots during a short rest.

wizard.description: A scholarly magic-user capable of manipulating the structures of reality.

availableSubclasses.name: School of Abjuration
availableSubclasses.description: Master protective magic and shielding wards.

availableSubclasses.name: School of Conjuration
availableSubclasses.description: Summon creatures and objects from thin air.

availableSubclasses.name: School of Divination
availableSubclasses.description: Peer into the future and manipulate fate itself.

availableSubclasses.name: School of Enchantment
availableSubclasses.description: Charm and manipulate the minds of others.

availableSubclasses.name: School of Evocation
availableSubclasses.description: Master destructive elemental magic and explosive spells.

availableSubclasses.name: School of Illusion
availableSubclasses.description: Deceive senses and create impossible phantasms.

availableSubclasses.name: School of Necromancy
availableSubclasses.description: Manipulate life force and command the undead.

availableSubclasses.name: School of Transmutation
availableSubclasses.description: Transform matter and alter reality's fundamental properties.
